short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart tool for Twitter, one click to export Twitter followers and following list to csv.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A smart tool for Twitter, one click to export Twitter followers to csv, export Twitter following list to csv.

How it works?
1. Enter a Twitter username
2. Select export type (followers or following list)
3. Click the export button

Data Privacy
All data is processed in your local computer, it is never passing through our web server, no one knows what you exported.
